sentences.sentence: A cadre should be ready to take a lower as well as a higher post.
This veteran cadre still remains his philosophy of hard work and plain-living.
sentences.translation: 这位老干部仍然保持着艰苦朴素的作风。

sentences.sentence: The village cadre said they did not do productive work, they just fooled around.
sentences.translation: 村干部说他们不好好生产，吊儿郎当。
